meanings.definition: The state or quality of being illusory.
meanings.sent1: The illusoriness of the magician's tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The illusoriness of the mirage in the desert fooled the weary travelers.
meanings.sent3: The illusoriness of the fake spider scared the little girl, but then she laughed.
meanings.sent4: The illusoriness of the dream faded as reality set in.
meanings.sent5: The illusoriness of the rainbow made it disappear as they approached.

meanings.definition: The deceptive appearance or impression of something.
meanings.sent1: The illusoriness of the advertisement misled many customers.
meanings.sent2: The illusoriness of the mask hid the identity of the mysterious guest.
meanings.sent3: The illusoriness of the fake mustache made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The illusoriness of the shadows played tricks on his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The illusoriness of the painting made it seem like it was moving.
